data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
DBIx::Recordset is complicated for writing tests over database
    applications, specially if people that write them are newbies to
    Perl.

    DBIx::Resultset is a very simple API that lets you get a resultset
    (result of a query) and browse its rows. I wrote it thinking in
    people that have to write tests for database services, but that
    arenÂ´t pure Perl programmers.
